product_name: Columbia Triple Trail II Shell Rain Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight, comfortable and perfect for sudden weather changes, the Triple Trail II Shell rain jacket from Columbia is a great addition to any pack. Rugged yet supple, waterproof, breathable Omni-Tech(R)/nylon laminate construction keeps you dry in all conditions; factory-sealed seams. Omni-Heat(R) thermal reflective lining boosts heat retention by an average of 20% over regular lining to keep you cozy on long days out in the cold. Fabric also employs 2-way stretch for a comfortable fit during active endeavors. Helmet-compatible, adjustable storm hood offers excellent protection from the elements and unhindered peripheral vision when cinched down. Water-resistant, 2-way zipper has an internal stormflap; abrasion-resistant chin guard protects delicate skin. Columbia Triple Trail II jacket features underarm vents with 2-way zippers provide on-demand ventilation. Drawcord adjustable hem and adjustable cuffs seal in warmth or let you ventilate depending on weather and activity level. Droptail hem; stretch-mesh-lined, zip hand pockets; internal security pocket; stretch-mesh drop-in pocket. Closeout.
